# selectionDidChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the input delegate when the selection has changed in the document.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func selectionDidChange(_ textInput: (any UITextInput)?)
```

## Parameters

- **textInput**: The document instance whose class adopts the UITextInput protocol.

## Related Documentation

- **textDidChange(_:)**: Tells the input delegate when text has changed in the document.

## Notifying the delegate of selection changes

- **selectionWillChange(_:)**: Tells the input delegate when the selection is about to change in the document.
